alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 5:48PM EST until December 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow accumulations of two to five inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
